option.name: SCRIPT_TEXT
option.value: @echo off & "venv36-64\Scripts\pyinstaller.exe" "qtapp.spec" --noconfirm & rmdir /S /Q "setup_files\" & del "dist\SiniKraft-STORE-win64.zip" & xcopy "dist\SiniKraft-STORE\*" "setup_files\" /s /e /h /y & copy "LICENSE" "setup_files\License.txt" & cd setup_files\ & powershell Compress-Archive "*" "./../dist/SiniKraft-STORE-win64.zip" & cd .. & "Inno Setup 6\ISCC.exe" "setup.iss" & rmdir /S /Q "setup_files\" & rmdir /S /Q "build\" & rmdir /S /Q "dist\SiniKraft-STORE\" & ren "dist\SiniKraft-STORE-Setup-0.2.0.exe" "SiniKraft-STORE-Setup-0.2.0-win64.exe" & echo Done ! x64 & "venv36-32\Scripts\pyinstaller.exe" "qtapp.spec" --noconfirm & rmdir /S /Q "setup_files\" & del "dist\SiniKraft-STORE-win32.zip" & xcopy "dist\SiniKraft-STORE\*" "setup_files\" /s /e /h /y & copy "LICENSE" "setup_files\License.txt" & cd setup_files\ & powershell Compress-Archive "*" "./../dist/SiniKraft-STORE-win32.zip" & cd .. & "Inno Setup 6\ISCC.exe" "setup.iss" & rmdir /S /Q "setup_files\" & rmdir /S /Q "build\" & rmdir /S /Q "dist\SiniKraft-STORE\" & ren "dist\SiniKraft-STORE-Setup-0.2.0.exe" "SiniKraft-STORE-Setup-0.2.0-win32.exe" & echo Done ! x32
